home.startgame: What are the common gameplay modes?
home.Onlysend: Only send (OneChain Network) assets to this address.
home.cancelledtransaction: The user has cancelled the transaction
home.transfersent: The transfer transaction has been sent
home.Pleaseenter: Please enter the quantity and payment address
home.ConfirmThe: Confirm the recipient accepts USDH on the OneChain network. Transfers to incompatible addresses are irreversible and will lead to loss of funds.
home.请确认: 请确认收款方支持通过 OneChain网络充入USDH，否则可能导致资金丢失
home.explorer: All results can be verified through a block explorer.
home.automated: Each round takes only seconds—betting, drawing, and settlement are fully automated.
home.restrictions: No time restrictions, no waiting in line. Start a round anytime, anywhere.
home.participate: Use the stable coin USDH to participate, free from exchange rate fluctuations.
home.title: Connecting {{name}}...
home.subtitle: Please wait, we are currently in communication with {{name}} establish a connection
home.desc11: Every time you place a bet, the system calls a set of on-chain transaction hashes and generates a result through a predetermined algorithm to determine if you win.
home.desc12: Since hash values are automatically generated on-chain and cannot be artificially controlled, game results are 100% fair.
home.desc21: Hash Size: Determine if the transaction hash is greater than or equal to 5 or the opposite
home.desc22: Hash Odd/Even: Determine if the last digit of the transaction hash is odd or even
home.desc23: Number Hash: Determine the last number in the transaction hash
home.desc24: Lucky Hash: Determine the combination form of the transaction hash trailing digits
home.desc31: 1. Install and activate OneWallet (browser extension wallet)
home.desc32: 2. Select any game on the homepage and enter the sub-page.
home.desc33: 3. Connect OneWallet, enter the bet amount (unit: USDH)
home.desc34: 4. Confirm the transaction and wait for the on-chain hash result
home.desc35: 5. Automatic settlement, know the result immediately
home.desc4: Yes. All games run on on-chain smart contracts with open rules, transparent results, and self-custody of funds. Oneplay's hash games do not store player funds; you control your own wallet and act as your own banker.
home.desc51: Original minimalist gameplay, betting-reward feedback-independent record querying for an extremely smooth experience
home.desc52: On the onechain, transaction hash values are secured by on-chain consensus mechanisms and cannot be tampered with. If game mechanisms are properly designed and avoid relying on user-controllable transactions, this hash value can serve as a secure and reliable game random source.

signin.desc: Sign in with Google/Apple or connect with existing wallet
